title: Historic City Hall
description: Built in 1890, this town hall is a great example of Victorian architecture.

title: Park Along the River
description: A beautiful green space featuring walking trails, playgrounds, and a pond.

title: Union County Heritage Museum
description: Explore exhibits showcasing the rich heritage of our community.

title: Tanglefoot Trail
description: Scenic trail along the river, perfect for biking and walking.

title: Union County Library
description: A modern library offering books, digital resources, and programs for all ages.

title: Stokes
description: The best place to get your food.

title: AC's Coffee
